name: Mega Jump (itch)
description:
Use the arrow keys to move and jump. Also, you can wrap around the edges of the screen.

Collect powerups! Rack up points! Be careful not to fall! Click the little button in the corner for fullscreen!

changelog

v1.3:

  • Added folks who climb alongside you. They move weirdly, though...

v1.2:

  • Added a background.
  • Various aesthetic changes.

v1.1:

  • -Added carnifloors.
  • -Changed the way moving platforms work.
  • -Added 'game over' screen.
